name: Puthu Vediyal Maruvalvu Maiyam
briefDescription: Puthu Vediyal Maruvaaluvu Maiyam is a registered Non-Profit Organization under the Indian Trust Act of 1981 in 2012 Founded by M. Suresh Kumar, the Organization has grown steadily over the years since 2012, whose main purpose is to extend helping hands to the poor through implementing various developmental programmes and projects hoping that the rural poor may be able to gain self-reliance & for the benefit of mankind especially for the economically and socially backward rural people.
